data.name: Alleycat
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1_Cat.
data.flavor: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

data.name: Arcane Shot
data.text: Deal $2 damage.
data.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

data.name: Bestial Wrath
data.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
data.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

data.name: Brave Archer
data.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
data.flavor: This is a "bearly" concealed reference.

data.name: Candleshot
data.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
data.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

data.name: Carnassa's Brood
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.

data.name: Fiery Bat
data.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
data.flavor: He'll always be our first.

data.name: Hound
data.text: Charge

data.name: Hunter's Mark
data.text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
data.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

data.name: Jeweled Macaw
data.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
data.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

data.name: On the Hunt
data.text: Deal $1 damage.\nSummon a 1/1 Mastiff.
data.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

data.name: Play Dead
data.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
data.flavor: He's a very literal dog.

data.name: Raptor Hatchling
data.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
data.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

data.name: Secret Plan
data.text: Discover a Secret.
data.flavor: The secret is... There is no plan!

data.name: Smuggler's Crate
data.text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

data.name: Stampede
data.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
data.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

data.name: The Marsh Queen
data.text: [x]Quest: Play seven\n1-Cost minions.\nReward: Queen Carnassa.
data.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

data.name: Timber Wolf
data.text: Your other Beasts have +1_Attack.
data.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

data.name: Tracking
data.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the_others.
data.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

data.name: Webspinner
data.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
data.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Ballista Shot
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $3 damage.

data.name: Ballista Shot
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $3 damage.

data.name: Bear Trap
data.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
data.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

data.name: Bomb Toss
data.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin_Bomb.
data.flavor: Me throw face.

data.name: Call Pet
data.text: Draw a card.\nIf it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
data.flavor: Real hunters tame hungry crabs.

data.name: Cat Trick
data.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
data.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Crackling Razormaw
data.text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly_Beast.
data.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

data.name: Cybertech Chip
data.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your_hand."
data.flavor: Goes great with Cyber-Salsa.

data.name: Dart Trap
data.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.
data.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Deadeye
data.text: For the rest of the game,\nyour Hero Power can target minions.

data.name: Dinomancy
data.text: Hero Power\nGive a Beast +2/+2.

data.name: Dinomancy
data.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
data.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

data.name: Explorer's Hat
data.text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
data.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.
data.howToGet: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Explosive Trap
data.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
data.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

data.name: Feign Death
data.text: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.
data.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

data.name: Fireworks Tech
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nMech +1/+1. If it has\nDeathrattle, trigger it.
data.flavor: She learns by trial and error.  Mostly error.

data.name: Flare
data.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
data.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

data.name: Freezing Trap
data.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
data.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

data.name: Glaivezooka
data.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
data.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

data.name: Goblin Prank
data.text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It_dies at end of turn.
data.flavor: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

data.name: Grievous Bite
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
data.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

data.name: Hidden Cache
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

data.name: Hunting Mastiff
data.text: Echo\nRush
data.flavor: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

data.name: Hunting Mastiff
data.text: Echo, Rush

data.name: Kindly Grandmother
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
data.flavor: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: King's Elekk
data.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
data.flavor: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

data.name: Lock and Load
data.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
data.flavor: Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."\n\nThis card pays homage to that special moment.

data.name: Misdirection
data.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
data.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

data.name: Quick Shot
data.text: Deal $3 damage.\nIf your hand is empty, draw a card.
data.flavor: Han shot first.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Rat Trap
data.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
data.flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

data.name: Scavenging Hyena
data.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
data.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

data.name: Shotgun Blast
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal 1 damage.

data.name: Snake Trap
data.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
data.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

data.name: Snipe
data.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
data.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

data.name: Steady Shot
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Steady Shot
data.text: Hero Power\nDeal $2 damage.

data.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
data.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
data.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

data.name: Toxic Arrow
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
data.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

data.name: Trogg Beastrager
data.text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

data.name: Venomizer
data.text: Magnetic\nPoisonous
data.flavor: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

data.name: Venomstrike Trap
data.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3_Poisonous Cobra.
data.flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.

data.name: Wandering Monster
data.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
data.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

data.name: Animal Companion
data.text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
data.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

data.name: Bearshark
data.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
data.flavor: "Candygram."

data.name: Carrion Grub
data.flavor: Carrion, my wayward grub.

data.name: Cat in a Hat
data.text: Stealth

data.name: Cave Hydra
data.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
data.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

data.name: Chronoshot
data.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand. It costs (2) more.

data.name: Cloaked Huntress
data.text: Your Secrets cost (0).
data.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Deadly Shot
data.text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
data.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

data.name: Desert Camel
data.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
data.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Dreadscale
data.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
data.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

data.name: Duskhaven Hunter
data.text: [x]Stealth\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.
data.flavor: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

data.name: Duskhaven Hunter
data.text: [x]Stealth\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.

data.name: Eaglehorn Bow
data.text: [x]Whenever a friendly\nSecret is revealed,\ngain +1 Durability.
data.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

data.name: Forlorn Stalker
data.text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

data.name: Huffer
data.text: Charge

data.name: Infest
data.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
data.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

data.name: Kill Command
data.text: Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal\n$5 damage instead.
data.flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

data.name: Leokk
data.text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.

data.name: Metaltooth Leaper
data.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
data.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

data.name: Misha
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Powershot
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
data.flavor: pow POW pow

data.name: Rat Pack
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nnumber of 1/1 Rats equal\n_to this minion's Attack.
data.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

data.name: Shaky Zipgunner
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random\nminion in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

data.name: Spider Bomb
data.text: Magnetic\nDeathrattle: Destroy a random_enemy_minion.
data.flavor: Wrecks a dude, any size. Catches thieves, eats those guys. Look out! Here comes a Spider Bomb!

data.name: Stablemaster
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
data.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

data.name: Stitched Tracker
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
data.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

data.name: Terrorscale Stalker
data.text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
data.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

data.name: Unleash the Hounds
data.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
data.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

data.name: Core Rager
data.text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
data.flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Dire Frenzy
data.text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
data.flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

data.name: Dispatch Kodo
data.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
data.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

data.name: Exploding Bloatbat
data.text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

data.name: Flanking Strike
data.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
data.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

data.name: Houndmaster
data.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
data.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

data.name: Houndmaster Shaw
data.text: Your other minions have\nRush.
data.flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

data.name: Infested Wolf
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
data.flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

data.name: Infinite Wolf
data.text: Rush. After this attacks,\nshuffle it into your deck and give future Infinite Wolves +2/+2.

data.name: Multi-Shot
data.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
data.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

data.name: Professor Putricide
data.text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
data.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

data.name: Toxmonger
data.text: [x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost\nminion, give it Poisonous.
data.flavor: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

data.name: Wing Blast
data.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
data.flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

data.name: Carrion Drake
data.text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
data.flavor: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

data.name: Cobra Shot
data.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
data.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

data.name: Corpse Widow
data.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
data.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

data.name: Emerald Spellstone
data.text: Summon three 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)

data.name: Explosive Shot
data.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
data.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

data.name: Greater Emerald Spellstone
data.text: Summon four 3/3_Wolves.

data.name: King of Beasts
data.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
data.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

data.name: Knuckles
data.text: After this attacks a\nminion, it also hits the enemy hero.
data.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

data.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
data.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

data.name: Necromechanic
data.text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
data.flavor: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

data.name: Piranha Launcher
data.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon a 1/1 Piranha.
data.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

data.name: Princess Huhuran
data.text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
data.flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

data.name: Queen Carnassa
data.text: Battlecry: Shuffle 15 Raptors into your deck.

data.name: Ram Wrangler
data.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a\nrandom Beast.
data.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

data.name: Starving Buzzard
data.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
data.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

data.name: Tol'vir Warden
data.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
data.flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

data.name: Tundra Rhino
data.text: Your Beasts have Charge.
data.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

data.name: Vilebrood Skitterer
data.text: Poisonous\nRush
data.flavor: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

data.name: Vilebrood Skitterer
data.text: Poisonous, Rush

data.name: Ball of Spiders
data.text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
data.flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

data.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all enemy minions.

data.name: Savannah Highmane
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
data.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

data.name: Seeping Oozeling
data.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
data.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

data.name: To My Side!
data.text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
data.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

data.name: Abominable Bowman
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
data.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

data.name: Acidmaw
data.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
data.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

data.name: Boommaster Flark
data.text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
data.flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

data.name: Crushing Walls
data.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
data.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

data.name: Gahz'rilla
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
data.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

data.name: Gladiator's Longbow
data.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
data.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

data.name: Rhok'delar
data.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
data.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

data.name: Swamp King Dred
data.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack_it.
data.flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

data.name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
data.text: [x]Summon 3 minions from\nyour deck. They attack\nenemy minions, then die.
data.flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

data.name: Giant Sand Worm
data.text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
data.flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

data.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
data.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
data.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

data.name: Call of the Wild
data.text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
data.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

data.name: King Krush
data.text: Charge
data.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

data.name: Emeriss
data.text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in_your hand.
data.flavor: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.
